tags: None
review:
Dr. Tiwari is a very kind person. He is available and easily reachable at any time. And in case of emergency. For a new born baby and new parents its very difficult to understand certain problems with the new born baby. Why he is crying so much, does he has some pain or sm other problem.my baby cried entire night as he had got sm infection and fever and suddenly vomits after every feed.i called  Dr. Tiwari early morning 7am and he  was available and answered my phone call and suggested the possible cause. Which many drs dont do. Firstly other drs are not available when u need them.and so early morming and late night they dont reply to ur cal or msg. Bt Dr. Tiwari is available on Watsapp to answer ur query related to ur new born baby at late night also. This has really boosted our confidence in Dr. Tiwari. And will definately recommend him to my frends nd other family members for their new born baby. 
He is the only hope when u dont understand whats wrong with ur baby. ******* * **** **** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: All Pediatric Problems ,Consultation provided for newborns ,
review: Dr Abhinav tiwari is very friendly and genuine person.My daughter is born in new Zealand and we recently arrived in India when she was 2.5 months old.Being new parents like everyone thinks we were also looking  for a reliable doctor for her further care and vaccination during our stay in india.Fortunately I came across him due to word of mouth and we are very happy for having found him.he is very polite and explains all your queries patiently and in detailed.Few weeks back my daughter was suffering from viral infection,it was late night and we were very tensed,in such circumstances Dr Abhinav was very cooperative and thankfully he was available on calls and text .he treated her immediately and gave us sigh of relief.I personally feel that we are in safe hands and would definitely recommend him for someone who are new parents and  looking for a trustworthy family doctor for their kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are visiting Dr. Abhinav right from our child birth which is almost 8 months now. First he is very helpful 24*7 whenever required. And he respond quickly to all our messages and call provides suggestions and medication as per symptoms description. He is good advicer related to all your child problem perfect solution for all ur problem, friendly and caring doctor which is most important and yes very polite. After seeing my son's growth and development 2 of my friends asked me for our son pediatrician and they have also started going to doctor Abhinav and are very satisfied and happy with his Service. Thank you doctor for all ur hard work and support all time that u show us. Would highly recommend to all my friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Abhinav Tiwari treated my son for high fever. When I reached out to him in emergency in early morning, as my son had extremely high temperature, he quickly responded and came to his clinic to check on my son even before the opening hours of his clinic amid heavy rains.He was constantly in touch with us for next few weeks to keep a tab on my son's condition and even reviewed the prescription till the time he recovered*** **  *** ** *** **** ************** * **** **** ******* *** also makes the children very comfortable with him, very patiently explains the parents about the kids condition, root cause , dos and donts and most importantly a very warm and caring person , an important quality which I feel is not there among most of the doctors today.Thank you  Dr for taking good care of my son:)
reply_text: Thanks  a lot shwetaji... For the kind words....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Abhinav Tiwari is one of the most friendly & professional paediatritions I have ever seen. His timely response to queries & guidance with medication is most helpful at times of real need. Unlike other doctors, inspite of being busy, he ensures that he responds to his patients in time & is very considerate with all queries, even if they are not so significant at times. This is the sign of a "good doctor". ** ***** **** *** ***** ** ********* ***** *** ****** * ******** ********** * it is rare to find a genuine old school doctor who truly believes in looking after his patients, & I feel proud to say Dr. Abhinav Tiwari is one of these rare doctors who still exist! I am extremely happy with his approach & practice & would higly recommend him for all those who are seeking genuine & effective medical advice.  Big thank you for everything Dr.Abhinav. All our best wishes to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Abhinav is always very attentive to what the patients is sayingHis diagnosis has been spot on (so far so good) His medication is effective (so far so good) Always available(replies back to the queries) on what's app as well and on callI live almost 6 km(one hour travel at times)  away having a lot of  pediatricians available much closer, But still prefer Dr. Abhinav Need i say more Thanks Doc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very good experience with Dr.Abhinav. Initially my wife was hesitant regarding him but looking at his approach and friendly nature she was quite happy getting our baby treated under his guidance.

Following good qualities regarding Dr.Abhinav experienced by us:
Understanding and caring.
Very friendly 
Always available 
Soft spoken
Gave treatment and symptom details 
Responded and resolved all queries
Highly recommended for child care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A kid's doctor has to be as friendly and cheerful as a kid... *** ****** ** ** *** *** **** ************ I and my husband have come across for our son.. He's been helpful, informative, calm and friendly all at the same time.

He is very passionate about his profession and understand's the fears and confusion of new parents...his informative conversations replace the fear with confidence.

Thank you for being here whenever we needed advice and guidance.

Lots of love,
The Kehimkars

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Abhinav cares about his patients in the most genuine way. I have called him at really odd times whenever there was an issue with my 2 year old, and he has always responded very promptly. His tone is always that of concern and he is very patient with his patients and their parents. The best part about him is his follow up. Not too many doctors will call you later to check how the kid is doing but Dr Abhinav does. His assessment and his treatment, both are impeccable and impressive. 

He is a great doctor and more importantly a wonderful human being. I would recommend him strongly to all the parents. Thanks Doc for all your help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My Daughter was struggling for 2 days with heavy coughing during nights, fever and weakness,  Dr. Abhinav's diagnosis and medicines recommended were so accurate that within 1 day we saw positive recovery. 

Dr. Abhinav's accumen has been superlative and made my kid and all of us feel very comfortable inspite of all the pain kid was facing and the stress we were facing as a parent.

With our past experiences of meeting all child specialist in Powai area, I have to confess that after meeting Dr. Abhinav, ** **** ****** *** ** *** *********, experience and the way he attended the situation. Fees are reasonable, clinic is beautiful, staff very helpful. He was also very  kind enough to pickup our calls late nights and provide solution over phone. 

We thank him for this support and would strongly recommend.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr.  Abhinav is a very good child friendly doctor. I visited his clinic on my family doctor's recommendation. My kid is healthy but I feel is a little obese compared to his age and so went for second consultation to him. 

His clinic is very well maintained and friendly staff.  My son usually gets nervous whenever a visit to doctor is there but this time he was excited seeing doraemons all around the walls and forgot about the doctor visit.  Dr.  Abhinav was very friendly during the checkup and overall consultation of my son. I am overall satisfied with the consultation and medical advice given by him and have surely added his number as my child's specialist.
